My best friends family is being torn apart by this confusion. please answer my question so his family's argumant can be settled. Matt McTavish Via the Internet Geezus FUCKING christ Matt...If your friends family argues about that stupid fuckin shit you should find better friends like people that hang around alleys. I used to argue with mom about somthing Eddie Murphy said in some of his movies, but It didnt start to tear my family apart IM hoping your exageratting a little bit on that if not your friends family probally pull out butcher knives to fuckin shit~can~carve at each other whenever the Keys to the family wagon come up missing. I have played this game its obvious he says "call me junior" but then again your friends family probally wasnt paying attention cause they were to busy giggling at each others private parts. Im actually convinced it was YOUR family you was whining about all along anyway. Matt your fuckin supa-mario-fuckin-stupid...an your moms a whore :D

This was a letter printed to nintendo in Vol. 20 1991 I am president of a club that goes by N.E.S.A Our motto is "that was easy." The other members and I are 17, and all toghether, we have finished 150 games. Members jason and Daniel have Game Boys that we play though big speakers during lunch--the teachers love that! I've gone as far as hooking up a Game Boy up to a guitar amp. At first it sounded obnoxious but after a few adjustments it sounded awsome. sometimes we get toghether and hook up out NES to a stereo. Some of the games ive finished are Dragon Warrior, Final Fantasy, Shadowgate, Snakes Revenge, and Ultima. Ive videotaped most of the endings so I can see them and show them to my friends without spending mega-hours completing them again. I also taped the cinema scenes and exciting conclusion to make my own "Ninja-Gaiden-the movie." I love playing my NES, but it doesnt take over my life. My first love is beating percussion, and ive even won some soloist awards at jazz festivals. A tip for Final Fantasy: Some weapons an armor have special magical powers; be sure to take advantage of them. T.C Christenson, Agent 212 Midway, Utah ZzZzZz...Waaah!!!! oh shit I almost fell asleep! First of all T. You want us to belive that Nintendo dosent take over your life...yet...most who saaay that are in fucking denial. 150 games??? For fucks sake Im not sure if Ive even played that many in my whole fuckin life an youre 17 wow! Gameboys games have a rep for bad repeating tunes so whats the fucking point in connecting them to your Amp? And tell me this...why in fucks sake would you tape the ending to a NES video game!? I remember beating Robocop and all the ending said was ... thanks for playing. Stay out of trouble. I wished to god that I had just gotton killed by the fuckin dog instead...haha dogs killin Robocop n'fuck. Anyway you just about sounded like a real Lame-fuck by trying to bore us with info on percussion an awards you may or may not have recived in grade school. OH yeah Heres a golden tip: percusssionists get beat up like whiny homos afterschool run run ruuuun!!!!

ITS COMPLETLY BULLSHIT IF SOMEGUY TRIED TO SUE ME FOR SHIT LIKE THAT HE WOULD BE HACKED INTO FUCKING RECCES PIECES AND SENT TO THE FUCKING JUDGE IN SEPERATE DOMINOES PIZZA BOXES. Just the other day while i was standing in a fucking long ass line at the supermarket i noticed a Jughead Jones "Archie" comic. I picked the motherfucker up thinking since i havent read one since 4th grade n' shit there would be changes or whatnot. Instead Ive noticed Its the same fucking bullshit thats been published since 1950 somthin. Riverdale....cursed beyond imagination.... Hasnt any of the stupid fucking idiots realized theyve been stuck in 1950 for the last 60 or somthinn years!? When is Archie an his stupid fucking gang gonna graduate n' start paying bills??? How long can 1950 based Archie comics be conciderd funny? I used to read the books along time ago and I can tell ya...Its not really funny anymore, they dont really come up with new material. Its time now to get archie out of his parents house and get a real fucking job...but NO! hell be working Lemonade stands for the rest of his fucking stupid exsistance. A cast of Fuckin stupidity...trapped in 1950 Archie: First of all this orange haired motherfucker gets chased by two stupid cunts drives a Box and is in a band...and basketball...and football....how does this peice of shit do all these things in one fucking day? Ive figured a day in Riverdale time is app. 200 hours long a day...Thats enough time for this Mommas boy to do all those wieird fucking things he does. What the FUCK is that ## thing on the side of his fucking head??? Did Reggie play a bad joke on him by trying to play Tic-Tac-Toe on the side of his head while he was sleeping? Archies a stupid fucking comic character WHICH IS WHY half of the fucking books are after Jughead "fucking" Jones or Betty fucking Veronica super slut special. Jughead "fucking" Jones: This ones really fucking stupid I realize Just about every motherfucker out there has made fun of that fucking "thing" he puts on his fucking head I just wanted to point out that fucking nose of his, he could please any of them fucking whores in the story with it ... LOOK at his mom an pop ..they have em too thats how they make out they rub them motherfuckers togeher till they POP! Thats where the whole "fucking" thing comes from ...If only the motherfucker could advance into the future he could easily Land a fucking porno job an ditch that homosexual whiny friend Archie of his. Betty (blonde whore): well FUCK if this slut-can had a last name I sure as hell cant remember. Most times shes just trying to get in Archies pants but alas!...If only she would realize hell be a fucking LOSER forever shed be shackin up with veronica. She seems to be the only female character in the series to have variable breast sizes. I swear to fucking god go take a damn look for yourself If ya fuckin dont belive me. One page shes got a C-cup the next shes got WHOA Double D's and then...wait ...what the fuck !? Dan De Carlo forgot to draw her fucking boobies on the next page!!! Veronica ( rich cock blocker ): probally the only fucking character that wouldnt fucking give a slimy didldo if they have been 17 for 60 fucking long ass years. Shes rich has a retarded father who for the life of me cant see getting any pussy therefor Veronicas adopted i guess...Her boobs stay the same unlike her lust for lesbian passion betty. She chases after her crush Archie in hopes shell give up an go lesbian. If anythings annoying about this slutty hoebanger its her fucking hair style its Black with a weird Blue thingamafucker on it. And shes the fashion queen...more like the Vibrating baseball bat queen. In real fucking life she wouldnt be wasting her damn time on a cunt-face like Archie. in fact she wouldnt really be interested in any of the stupid ass fucking characters in this ate up story about 1950 forever. Reggie (reji? rggae? re-gay?): I figured that this was supposed to be the "straight" version of Jughead or some shit. In secret no-motherfuckin-body likes reggie. He tries to steal BOTH fucking girls from Archie cept neither one takes him serious cause hes a fucking drag-queen in denial. Im not sure how ya even pronounce his name and i dont even give two whores in a sardine can to know. Hes that "guy" in highschool that always followed the "crowd" around but wasnt exactly conciderd in the "crowd". FUCK Reggie hes a pussy anyway. Ive seen better cartoon characters swim out of a Vagina and land on print. Moose and Dilton Dooley: Ha ha I like these two ...Moose who is about as fucking intelligent as an empty milk carton is found usually working really hard with all 7 brain cells to Stump-fuck Midge. those who gets into this bad motha-fuckas way usually gets Klump bashed into a nearby trashcan. (theres always a trashcan near Moose haHA!? ) MOOSE: Duuuuuh....midge? Midge" whaaat uuugh!? MOOSE: gimmie sume ase behotch...DUUUUH...pluse? Midge: WEEA!? no MOOSE: DUUUUH BeeHooootchh...(((((WACK!!!!))))) right into the trashcan... As for dilton Dooley he was the "dork" of the story but for my money got more fuckin poon-tang than all the other characters combined. Only thing that botherd me was them becon eyes hes got. Them motherfuckers gave me nightmares an made me wanna go fuckin crazy an slice people up with a tomamto juicer...which is how he got into any sluts pants he wanted. Ethel and midge: Both were ONLY drawn so that Jughead and moose could have dates to thier 60 some odd Proms. Both look about as good looking as a shit-turd with make-up on...I take that back...theyre much more horrid in appearnce than that. Both Whores look as if the cartoonist was drunk an decided "hey! I bet I can draw these hot bitches blindfolded" I took a pencil an tried to redraw them but it failed an it looked as if both had a bad case of Herpes an syphillisaids. Which is why i belive Moose horse-punched both of them. Ok im way to fucking tired to write about any more of them if anyone wants a bio on the rest of them let me know GOODNIGHT fuckers have bad dreams n' shit.
